Self.Wiki: Determines the adjustments to apply to client players during a multiplayer session.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the Product version package.

client1SpEffectId.Wiki: An effect to apply to a friendly client.

client2SpEffectId.Wiki: An effect to apply to a friendly client.

client3SpEffectId.Wiki: An effect to apply to a friendly client.

bOverrideSpEffect.AltName: Adjust SpEffects on Client Count Change
bOverrideSpEffect.Wiki: If ON, when the number of clients changes, re-assess the SpEffect applications.
